project_descr: In coordination with the Prime Minister's Office/Office for Good Governance and Human Rights and the Agency for Gender Equality, UNDP is planning to undertake a research/survey regarding persons with disabilities to identify the urgent needs.

outputs.output_descr: Develop and implement viable sectoral strategies to promote the full participation of persons with disabilities in society and mainstream disability throughout all policy areas of Kosovo.

project_title: population survey for the persons with disabilities
